name: S E V E R A N C E (itch)
name_original: S E V E R A N C E (itch)
description:
WELCOME BACK, HUMAN RESOURCES AGENT.

Globosync is going through financial restructuring,
and it is up to you to offer our many employees severance.

Worry not, Human Resources Agent.
Although there are many employees to terminate today,
Globosync offers a variety of severance packages for you to work with in these uncertain financial times.

GLOBOSYNC THANKS YOU FOR YOUR HARD WORK.

S E V E R A N C E was created by James Brooks,
as a submission for the 2020 Disc Room Game Jam - Hosted by Devolver Digital.
